The use of reverse: image search tool, Tin Eye, to track down several of the photos included in the post and determine their original locations and dates.
The identification of specific photos in: such as the horse being pulled through a smoky field in Simi Valley, California, and the deer standing near a burned residence in Paradise, California.
The comparison of the images in the post: such as the viral photo of a tiger on fire that was taken in Jakarta, Indonesia in 2012 and depicted a bonfire of taxidermy animals.
The collaboration with Facebook to flag: highlighting the need for fact-checking and verification in online content.
